verbs.description: The Trump administration 's new " zero tolerance " policy toward [ARG0: migrants] [R-ARG0: who] [V: cross] [ARG1: the United States border] [ARGM-MNR: illegally] has reportedly driven up the number of migrant children held in government custody without their parents .

The Trump administration 's new " zero tolerance " policy toward migrants who cross the United States border illegally [V: has] reportedly driven up the number of migrant children held in government custody without their parents .

[ARG0: The Trump administration 's new " zero tolerance " policy toward migrants who cross the United States border illegally] has [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: driven] [ARG2: up] [ARG1: the number of migrant children held in government custody without their parents] .

The Trump administration 's new " zero tolerance " policy toward migrants who cross the United States border illegally has reportedly driven up the number of [ARG1: migrant children] [V: held] [ARGM-LOC: in government custody] [ARGM-ADV: without their parents] .
